message: Let's start fair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  What do you think?
Alice, your offer was a bit too much in your favor. Let's be fair, I'll take the same split you proposed but with me getting the slightly larger share this time.
Okay, I see your point.  Let's split it more evenly. I'll take 48 and you get 52.  This should give us both a reasonable share.
